OffscreenCanvasRenderingContext2DCommit.summary:
The
OffscreenCanvasRenderingContext2D.commit()
method of the Canvas 2D API copies the rendering context's bitmap to the bitmap of the placeholder canvas element of the associated OffscreenCanvas object.
The copy operation is synchronous. Calling this method is not needed for the transfer, since it happens automatically during the event-loop execution.
